https://tmrev.io/movie/634167-A Imitação 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rpeClirHdDC3Hn2ZkYgL9yLEiPM.jpg An act of passion, filmed in a church turned into a bar, on Easter 2003, and starring as many actors as the days of the year… Taking the sacred painting as a reference, the film questions the human condition: letting oneself die like Christ or betray scientifically like Peter? A Imitação
